name: Albert
title: Lead Developer
bio: John is our lead developer with over 10 years of experience in web development. He specializes in frontend architecture and has led numerous successful projects for major clients.

name: Mattias
title: UX Designer
bio: Jane brings creativity and user-centered thinking to every project. With a background in both design and psychology, she ensures our applications are not just functional but delightful to use.

name: Joel
title: Backend Engineer
bio: Michael handles our server-side architecture and database design. His focus on scalability and performance ensures our applications can handle growing user demands.

name: Johan
title: Project Manager
bio: Sarah is the glue that holds our projects together. With her exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail, she ensures that every project runs smoothly and meets deadlines.
